messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: [Subject: Tapes from HSC conference for sale!
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/26/02 4:13:03 PM, atwttmab@aol.com writes:  Yep.
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/26/02 4:13:03 PM, atwttmab@... writes:

<< Sorry for being a dimwit, but what are the numbers after each title? Ref.
nos.? >>

Yep.

<<Can anyone tell me a little more about what's covered on each one?>>

You could look on the website for descriptions of the workshops, and it's
still linked from SandraDodd.com/speaking (under recent conferences).

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: [Subject: Tapes from HSC conference for	sale!
messages.msgSnippet: ... I m not sure about the numbers, though I imagine they are order numbers.  If you want to know more about the speakers, see
messages.messageBody:
on 8/26/02 3:10 PM, atwttmab@... at atwttmab@... wrote:

> Sorry for being a dimwit, but what are the numbers after each title? Ref.
> nos.?
> Can anyone tell me a little more about what's covered on each one? I think I
> could persuade dh to listen to one easier than I could get him to read about
> it!
> thanks
> Lynda
> (ever the optimist!)
> mum to 3

I'm not sure about the numbers, though I imagine they are order numbers. If
you want to know more about the speakers, see
http://conference.hsc.org/information/information.html

(Better look soon, though, since the info. is now out of date and might
disappear!)

Nancy (who attended said conference <g>)

messages.subject: Re: [Subject: Tapes from HSC conference for sale!
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 26/08/02 15:26:48 GMT Daylight Time, ... Sorry for being a dimwit, but what are the numbers after each title? Ref. nos.? Can anyone tell me
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 26/08/02 15:26:48 GMT Daylight Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:


> Subject: Tapes from HSC conference for sale!
>
> I hope this comes out legibly!
> I've listened to the four I was in on and they all came out clearly and
> seem
> good and useful!
>
> I will have some tapes with me in Texas and South Carolina when I go there
> in
> October, but for other people or those in a hurry, here's this.
>
> I won't be speaking from the same notes (I try not to) for either of those,
> so it won't be a direct repeat, although I'm always on that unschooling
> topic...
>
> Sandra
>
>
>

Sorry for being a dimwit, but what are the numbers after each title? Ref.
nos.?
Can anyone tell me a little more about what's covered on each one? I think I
could persuade dh to listen to one easier than I could get him to read about
it!
thanks
Lynda
(ever the optimist!)
mum to 3
